displayProperties.name: Kalli, the Corrupted
displayProperties.description: Kalli is an Awoken Techeun who served Queen Mara Sov before being Taken by Oryx and transformed into Kalli, the Corrupted.

displayProperties.name: Shuro Chi, the Corrupted
displayProperties.description: Shuro Chi is an Awoken Techeun who served Queen Mara Sov before being Taken by Oryx and transformed into Shuro Chi, the Corrupted.

displayProperties.name: Morgeth, the Spirekeeper
displayProperties.description: Morgeth, the Spirekeeper is an enormous, powerful Taken Ogre which serves as the enforcer of Riven's corruption in the Dreaming City, and the guard of the City's main tower, The Keep of Voices.

displayProperties.name: The Vault
displayProperties.description: A locking mechanism which secures something dangerously powerful.

displayProperties.name: Riven of a Thousand Voices
displayProperties.description: Riven, the last known Ahamkara, formerly in the service of Mara Sov, was Taken by Oryx. She now corrupts the city from its heart at the behest of Savath√ªn.

displayProperties.name: Crypt Security
displayProperties.description: Penetrate the Bray facility's security protocols and gain access to the Deep Stone Crypt.

displayProperties.name: Taniks, Reborn
displayProperties.description: Interrupt the station's Nuclear Descent Protocol and secure it from Taniks.

displayProperties.name: Taniks, the Abomination
displayProperties.description: Thwarting Taniks made him grow stronger. Destroy him, once and for all...

displayProperties.name: Confluxes
displayProperties.description: Secure Vex constructs by preventing Vex sacrifices.

displayProperties.name: Oracles
displayProperties.description: Counter the Oracles' song or be marked for negation and lost to time.

displayProperties.name: The Templar
displayProperties.description: An extremely powerful Vex Hydra, The Templar is unique in it being a creature out of time. As such, it can manipulate reality in accordance to the Oracles' design.

displayProperties.name: The Gatekeepers
displayProperties.description: Protectors of the Glass Throne, the Gatekeepers are Vex Hydras who stand as the Throne's last defence.

displayProperties.name: Atheon, Time's Conflux
displayProperties.description: The Axis Mind responsible for bridging the Vex's own calculations into existence.
